#!/bin/bash
#  Author: David J. Veer (dveer@northwest.ca), Sept 2013
#
#  A simple script command to move test xml files generated by TMS integration into the 
#  /srv/home/wlsc_tst/INBOUND folder to be processed.  No error checking, just single line.
#  
#  So logically, Move /srv/home/*_tst/INBOUND/*.xml into /srv/home/wlsc_tst/INBOUND
#
#  Disclaimer: For internal, IS Server Group use only.

for x in $(find /srv/home -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 -type d ! -path "*wlsc_tst*" -name '*_tst' -printf '%f\n'); do find /srv/home/$x/INBOUND -maxdepth 1 -type f -print0 -name '*.xml' | xargs -0 mv -t /srv/home/wlsc_tst/INBOUND; done

exit 0
